title: Vista x86 Reliablity & Compatiblity Pack
description:
Vista x86

2.No need for WGA passing.
3.No Virus ,Spyware ,Rootkit ,Shit ,...

5.SEED for others.

* All the updates are ORIGINAL.

Update for Windows Vista (KB925528) 

This is a reliability update. Install this update to resolve reliability issues with some USB hardware devices and controllers.
